for every `x`. Note that this condition actually implies equality, as is shown in

class CStarRing (E : Type*) [NonUnitalNormedRing E] [StarRing E] : Prop where

instance (priority := 100) to_normedStarGroup : NormedStarGroup E :=
  âŸ¨by
    intro x

    Â· simp only [htriv, star_zero]

      have hâ‚ : âˆ€ z : E, â€–zâ‹† * zâ€– â‰¤ â€–zâ‹†â€– * â€–zâ€– := fun z => norm_mul_le zâ‹† z
      have hâ‚‚ : âˆ€ z : E, 0 < â€–zâ€– â†’ â€–zâ€– â‰¤ â€–zâ‹†â€– := fun z hz => by
        rw [â† mul_le_mul_right hz]; exact (CStarRing.norm_mul_self_le z).trans (hâ‚ z)
      have hâ‚ƒ : â€–xâ‹†â€– â‰¤ â€–xâ€– := by
        conv_rhs => rw [â† star_star x]
        exact hâ‚‚ xâ‹† (gt_of_ge_of_gt (hâ‚‚ x hnt) hnt)
